text: Amentum: A Fine Close To The Year, With Favorable Prospects Ahead (Rating Upgrade). Amentum Holdings is upgraded from hold to buy on a robust backlog enabling strong visibility, a thrust towards high-margin markets, cheaper valuations, and momentum. AMTM's backlog of $47B enables visibility of over 3 years, with order bookings also rising at a faster pace than revenue conversion. FCF is poised to expand by 12% next year, thus enabling the leverage to dip below 3x while unlocking M&A in high-growth, high-margin verticals like space, digital infrastructure, and nuclear.
label: positive

text: Dine Brands: The Dual-Branded Catalyst Is Real, But Timing Now Matters (Rating Downgrade). Dine Brands delivered a 52% total return over the past year, reaching my fair value target of $30–$35. Dual-branded units are a powerful catalyst, offering franchisees 2.5x sales uplift and 28% IRR, with significant long-term revenue potential. Despite strong buybacks and capital returns, EBITDA margins have compressed due to company-owned stores and elevated Capex.
label: positive

text: PRGO Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Perrigo Company plc Securities Fraud Lawsuit. NEW YORK, Dec. 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Why: Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, reminds purchasers of securities of Perrigo Company plc (NYSE: PRGO) between February 27, 2023 and November 4, 2025, both dates inclusive (the "Class Period"), of the important January 16, 2026 lead plaintiff deadline. So what: If you purchased Perrigo securities during the Class Period you may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out of pocket fees or costs through a contingency fee arrangement.

text: Public Service Enterprise Group: New Jersey's Utility Bill Crisis Creates An Opportunity. PEG's regulated utility operations deliver stable earnings, with 90% of operating income from PSE&G and growth supported by recent rate case settlements and capital investments. Rising demand from population growth and AI-driven energy consumption, combined with PEG's clean energy positioning, create significant long-term growth opportunities.

text: Sprouts Deadline: SFM Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Sprouts Farmers Market, Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit.
